_source.short_desc: No-code document automation software to turn your frequently-used forms and template documents into intelligent web forms.
_source.long_desc:
No-code document assembly software to create custom webforms that populate data into your Word or PDF documents. Two steps:

1. First, create your questionnaire (like on Typeform). 
2. Load your template documents and connect the questions to your documents. Add logic jumps, conditions, calculations, and formatting specifications.

Then, run your workflow or share with others to generate finalized docs. Users save 90% of drafting time.

Book a live demo: www.documate.org/automation/demo/
_source.pricing_details:
$99/month for the LITE version. 
$199/month for the STANDARD version. 
Enterprise plans are also available. Contact Documate for a custom quote.
Annual subscription comes with 2 months free.
_source.target_audience: Documate started in the legal market with law firms of all sizes, legal aid, and courts. It has expanded as a document assembly platform for HR, finance, medical and anyone who touches documents

category_features.name: Batch Processing
category_features.definition: Software?s ability to perform similar action on multiple similar files simultaneously

category_features.definition: Encryption secures data associated with a signed document and helps verify the authenticity of a signed record

category_features.definition: Supports more than one file format for finished product output

category_features.name: Templates
category_features.definition: Sample files or documents that could be customized as needed or used as is

related_products.short_desc: With monday.com Work OS you can create, edit, and manage documents effectively in one shared workspace.
related_products.features: With monday.com Work OS you can create, edit, and manage documents effectively in one shared workspace. Standardize all important documentation such as forms and contracts, automate document approval processes to save time and decrease error, and easily collaborate on documents in real-time. Use customizable templates to quickly create and modify your organization's most commonly used documents, and view the related data in dynamic dashboards.

related_products.short_desc: An all-in-one online PDF editor, built-in e-signature and fillable form builder.
related_products.features: pdfFiller is a GDPR compliant online PDF editor, e-signature manager and fillable PDF form builder in a single web app. Edit and e-sign PDF documents online, create fillable PDF forms and send them for signing. Share documents via email, social media or host them on your company's website. Fax, print or send PDFs via USPS right from your pdfFiller  account. Get completed copies of submitted and signed PDF forms and automatically extract data to an Excel file, CRM or database.

related_products.short_desc: Create, edit, convert, sign, and combine documents with Adobe's all-in-one PDF and e-signature solution.
related_products.features: Adobe Acrobat is the all-in-one PDF and e-signature solution trusted by Fortune 500 companies. With Acrobat, you can create, edit, convert, share, sign, and combine documents - all from one Adobe platform. You can build seamless digital experiences that enable your team to collaborate and work from any device, anywhere. Acrobat solutions are also designed to integrate with apps you use every day, including Microsoft 365, Google, Workday, and more, so you can get things done in the flow of work.

related_products.short_desc: Automate personalized, pre-formatted documents that your teams use every day.
related_products.features: Engage buyers with personalized experiences: automate personalized, pre-formatted documents that your teams use every day. Avoid manual updates with the ability to convert static content into dynamic documents that can be quickly updated across every piece of collateral.

related_products.short_desc: Start a FREE TRIAL and automatically generate documents from data + deliver them wherever you want. Plans start at $92/month.
related_products.features: Automate document creation with Formstack Documents and reach optimal digital maturity as described in the 2022 State of Digital Maturity: Advancing Workflow Automation report. Start a FREE TRIAL to eliminate paperwork and transform data into beautifully designed documents you can send anywhere. Instantly merge data from the cloud into a PDF, Word doc, spreadsheet, or PowerPoint to generate proposals, applications, contracts, and more. Plans start at $92/month.

related_products.short_desc: Eliminate the monotony of back-and-forth emails. Gather all the documents, signatures, and data you require up to 80% faster.
related_products.features:
Eliminate the monotony of back-and-forth emails and inefficient systems when gathering client information. Get hours back each week as FIleInvite handles the most time-consuming work for you.

Gather all the documents, signatures, and data you require up to 80% faster. Set a due date and send an Invite. Your clients receive an email with a link to their own secure client portal, they're then guided through an intuitive portal experience where they can action your requests.

related_products.short_desc: No-code, drag & drop email & landing page design tool.  No html skills required, create multi-content campaigns in minutes.
related_products.features: Every day someone has an email or landing page to send. It could be an internal HR team communicating new policies, a marketing team building emails for multi-content campaigns, a school district sharing emails with the Parent/Student community. BEE Pro is a cloud-based drag-and-drop editing solution that helps businesses quickly build templates for newsletters, announcements, transactional emails, landing pages, one-page websites, and more.

related_products.short_desc:
Efficient contract management for modern businesses.
Manage the entire lifecycle of your contracts in a single, fully automated flow.
related_products.features:
Contractbook is a software company that enables small and medium-sized businesses to manage the entire lifecycle of their contracts in a single, fully automated flow. 

Funded by investors including byFounders and Gradient Ventures, Contractbook was founded in Copenhagen in 2017 and serves 5000+ companies in more than 75 countries with data-driven contract automation.

related_products.short_desc: HotDocs is industry leading software that automates the production of documents for thousands of organizations, all over the world.
related_products.features: HotDocs Advance turns frequently used documents and forms into reusable templates, allowing you to create customized, error-free documentation in a fraction of the time. Streamline your organization's workflow with the world's most trusted and powerful document automation platform.

related_products.short_desc: Stripo.email - all-in-one email design platform with over 600 000 users worldwide.Stripo allows marketers and designers to build email.
related_products.features:
Stripo is an all-in-one email design platform with over 600 000 users worldwide. 

Build emails of any complexity really fast and push them with just 1 click. Stripo is integrated with 70 ESPs/CRMs, including Mailchimp, HubSpot, Salesforce, Campaign Monitor, Braze, SendGrid, eSputnik, Outlook, Gmail, etc. 

1115 ready-to-use templates, modular email design, Email Translate Service. A number of embedded micro-tools give everything you need for emails. Stripo enables embeddable solution aka plugin

related_products.short_desc: Convert any HTML documents to high-fidelity PDF in seconds.
related_products.features:
Pdfshift.io is a high-quality, high-fidelity and powerful HTML to PDF conversion API.
It provides an easy-to-learn endpoint with a complete set of functionalities, package for many languages (Node, Python, and PHP) to simplify yo ur work and get you started in under a minute.

similar_products.short_desc: Inspire Flex enables users to create & deliver personalized, compliant customer communications across all channels from one platform.
similar_products.features: Quadient is the driving force behind the world's most meaningful customer experiences. Quadient Inspire helps companies create nimble, effective, and unified customer communications for all digital and print channels, managed from a single, central platform with simple drag and drop layout design, to deliver a complete omnichannel customer experience that spans the entire customer journey.

similar_products.short_desc: Windward Core is the global leader in embedded document generation solutions, allowing users to create any kind of document imaginable.
similar_products.features: Windward Core is the global leader in document generation solutions. Core embeds into applications with only 11 lines of code. It enables users to design templates using business logic and multiple data sources within the familiar landscape of Microsoft Office. Core is fast, easy, and removes human error, transforming the way business professionals create documents. ISVs and OEMs can quickly take their custom solutions with powerful reporting capabilities to the market by integrating with Core.

similar_products.short_desc: Create consistently branded documents, proposals, PPT presentations and Excel charts. Easily manage your brand centrally online.
similar_products.features: BrandOffice, developed by BrandQuantum is a software solution that seamlessly integrates with Microsoft Office to empower every employee in the organisation to automatically create consistently branded documents, PowerPoint presentations and Excel reports and ensures the brand remains relevant as it evolves.

similar_products.short_desc: - Leading No Code Platform - Easily create automated, bespoke documents and contracts using our advanced, easy-to-use platform.
similar_products.features: - Leading No Code Platform - Easily create automated, bespoke documents and contracts using our advanced, easy-to-use platform. Automate & streamline your existing tedious document generation processes. By using information intake, conditional content, bulk processing, approval workflows, in-app documents, dashboards, and integrations. Enables teams to better manage and scale their services to improve access, value, and speed to the organsiation.

similar_products.short_desc: Automate drafting and managing your documents. Join 170K+ users in over 50 countries from top tier law firms and F500 firms like PwC.
similar_products.features:
Document Automation & Contract Assembly; Smart Workflows, Approvals, & Document Management; Advanced Electronic Signature. 

All under one roof with Legito, your Smart Document Workspace. 

In under two hours, out-of-the-box functionality has you ready to automate documents that almost draft themselves. 

Over 160,000 users in 50 countries from top tier law firms and companies use Legito to manage documents, including LexisNexis, Price Waterhouse Coopers, Skoda Auto, and Societe Generale Group.

similar_products.short_desc: Switch on document generation for legal professionals with Thomson Reuters? HighQ.
similar_products.features: HighQ's modern, adaptable, and continuously-learning legal workflow platform delivers an open and scalable foundation, embedded machine intelligence and analytics, and smart integration points with firm-critical applications. Dramatically improve how you plan, organize, track, and complete work more efficiently with personalized client portals and real-time access and insights on legal project work, ready-to-use task lists and templates, and automated workflow-enabled legal process maps.

similar_products.short_desc: Transform your document-centric processes and empower business users with leading document generation and automation.
similar_products.features: Xpertdoc's innovative and intuitive document generation and automation product empowers you to simplify, optimize and automate consistent processes for the creation, generation, management, delivery, storage, and e-signature of better documents, faster, resulting in improved communications, accelerated business processes, increased productivity, and reduced dependence on IT. Plus, we offer integrations to leading CRM platforms and enterprise core systems such as ERP, CPQ, ECM, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Full-Service cloud based platform to automate production of legal documents for lending, leasing and legal applications.
similar_products.features: Web-based platform to automate production of legal documents for various use cases, including for lending, leasing and legal industries.  We are a full-service company that provides both the software platform and the template creation service, so you don't have to learn the setup process (such as creating variables, embedding if-then statements, etc.), which will guarantee a smooth and professional implementation.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contract Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contract Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contract Management software automates the creation, tracking, and monitoring of contracts and agreements. Contract Management software also allows for the company-wide sharing of contract documents and management of differing document versions. These contract management applications often provide top-down control and monitoring of contract status, key dates, and personnel responsibilities. Contract Management software is related to Customer Relationship Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Data Entry software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Data Entry tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Data Entry software eliminates tedious and labor-intensive manual data entry by providing tools for automatic data extraction, verification, and transfer into a system database. Data Entry software is an essential part of Forms Automation software and Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Document Control software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Document Control tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Document Control software helps businesses manage their documents in a way that is compliant with government and industry regulations.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Document Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Document Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Document Management software automates the process of managing documents from creation to storage to distribution throughout an enterprise, increasing efficiency and reducing the cost and clutter of maintaining paper records. Document Management applications provide solutions for a wide range of document needs from low specificity, high volume items such as standard forms to highly specific, low volume items such as one-to-one correspondence. Document Management software is related to Digital IT Asset Management software and Knowledge Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Document Version Control software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Document Version Control tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Document Version Control software allows organizations to track and manage changes to their documents.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Forms Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Forms Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Forms Automation software gives companies the ability to streamline document workflows. These solutions optimize document creation, printing, faxing, merging, security, and inbound/outbound document traffic. Companies can create and manage nearly any kind of document, from invoices to incident reports, and can easily track collected information. Forms Automation software is relevant to most industries and is related to Business Process Management software, Content Management software, Contract Management software, and Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Document Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Document Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Document Management software allows legal professionals to organize and quickly access electronically-stored legal documents. Scanning, imaging, and merging allow these documents to be included in a database that is searchable and sortable in any number of ways. This type of software can also allow for transcript and transcription management. Legal Document Management software is related to Document Management software, Legal Case Management software, Law Practice Management software, and Court Management software.
